case_name: Committee for Public Education & Religious Liberty v. Nyquist
first_party: Committee for Public Education & Religious Liberty
second_party: Ewald B. Nyquist, Commissioner of Education of New York
winning_party: Committee for Public Education & Religious Liberty
advocate_description_0: argued the cause for appellants in No. 72-694 and for appellees in Nos. 72-753, 72-791, and 72-929
advocate_description_1: Assistant Solicitor General of New York, argued the cause for Nyquist et al., appellees in No. 72-694 and appellants in No. 72-791
advocate_description_2: argued the cause for appellants in No. 72-929 and for appellees Boylan et al. in No. 72-694
advocate_description_3: argued the cause for appellant in No. 72-753
